events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position. The resume looks promising with relevant experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The candidate's application has been categorised under Engineering based on keywords such as 'software', 'developer', and 'cloud'. They fit well within the backend developer role.
Recruiter assigned to the candidate. The recruiter will now reach out to schedule an initial screening call and gather more information about their technical skills.
Initial screening completed via phone call. The candidate demonstrated good understanding of software engineering principles and expressed strong interest in the position.
Candidate confirmed availability for the technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm to discuss their experience in system design and coding.
Technical interview scheduled for April 10th. Interviewers will assess coding skills, system design abilities, and problem-solving approaches.
Technical interview completed successfully. Candidate solved complex coding problems with ease and showed excellent knowledge of scalable system architectures.
Scheduled HR interview to discuss culture fit, benefits, and candidate's career goals. This is the final step before deciding on the offer proposal.
HR interview went well. Candidate aligns with company values and showed great motivation to join the team and contribute to ongoing projects.
Formal offer proposed to the candidate including competitive compensation, benefits, and flexible work arrangements tailored to their preferences.
Candidate responded with positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the company and start contributing as soon as possible.
Candidate officially accepted the offer. Welcome message sent along with next steps for onboarding and integration into the engineering team.
The new hire has started onboarding. They are being introduced to the team and given access to tools and resources necessary for their role.
Recruitment process successfully closed. The candidate has fully onboarded and is expected to be a valuable addition to the engineering department.
